modName: Tera Val Virkai and Elenium CBBE Armor
summary:
These are two of the CBBE  armor of the Tera Armors
The Val Virkai(21) and Elenium (19)
descriptionHtml:
These are two of the CBBE armors of the Tera Armors. *this is not my work, but allows others to easily find and have an alternative body type* 
The Val Virkai(21) and Elenium (19) 
They can be found and crafted in Daedric Smithing section at the Forge
Missing arm textures for Elenium, a quick fix is to use asianboy\'s TERA Armors Collection mod 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846
and just replace the mesh files of zzteral 19 and with the Elenium meshes, and the arms are fixed.
